time_markers.text: When I was a Consul in Finland, my husband took a paternity leave and stayed at home with Kristjan, our son, for a year.
quotes: When I was a Consul in Finland, my husband took a paternity leave and stayed at home with Kristjan, our son, for a year.

time_markers.text: In Washington DC and Moscow, I was by myself.
quotes: In Washington DC and Moscow, I was by myself.

roles.title: Consul
quotes: When I was a Consul in Finland, my husband took a paternity leave and stayed at home with Kristjan, our son, for a year.

roles.title: diplomat
quotes: Also, today it is not only the diplomats, who have to balance family and work in a foreign country since numerous occupations require working abroad- be it in Finland or some other place.
Before the events in Moscow, you were a diplomat behind the scene; however, after Moscow, you became a public figure.

In Washington DC and Moscow, I was by myself.

However, I was ready to come back from the States and Russia in case it had not worked.
